languages.text: По наступившей гробовой тишине Лорд-капитан понял{mf||а}, что что-то не так. Проследив взгляды людей, он{mf||а} увидел{mf||а}, что связной отряда, несущий большой вокс-передатчик с антенной и передатчиком, сильно отстал. И лампочка вокса не горела! Отряд не получал сейчас никаких входящих сигналов. И даже если б получил — голос не мог бы звучать настолько близко, будто связной — или сам Енхо Сон — стоят вплотную к Вольному Торговцу...

traits.locale_text: По наступившей гробовой тишине Лорд-капитан понял{mf||а}, что что-то не так. Проследив взгляды людей, он{mf||а} увидел{mf||а}, что связной отряда, несущий большой вокс-кастер с антенной и передатчиком, сильно отстал. И лампочка вокса не горела! Отряд не получал сейчас никаких входящих сигналов. И даже если б получил — голос не мог бы звучать настолько близко, будто связной — или сам Енхо Сон — стоят вплотную к Вольному Торговцу...

languages.text: The ensuing deathly silence alerted the Lord Captain that something was wrong. Following the gazes of his team, {mf|he|she} saw that the unit's dispatcher, who was carrying the large vox-caster with the antennae and transmitter, was lagging far behind the rest of the group. And the transmission indicator was dark — there were no incoming messages. Even if there had been, Sohn's voice couldn't have sounded so close, as if the dispatcher — or Sohn himself — were standing right next to the Rogue Trader...
languages.original_text: По наступившей гробовой тишине Лорд-капитан понял{mf||а}, что что-то не так. Проследив взгляды людей, он{mf||а} увидел{mf||а}, что связной отряда, несущий большой вокс-передатчик с антенной и передатчиком, сильно отстал. И лампочка вокса не горела! Отряд не получал сейчас никаких входящих сигналов. И даже если б получил — голос не мог бы звучать настолько близко, будто связной — или сам Енхо Сон — стоят вплотную к Вольному Торговцу...

And the transmission indicator was dark — there were no incoming messages. Even if there had been, Sohn's voice couldn't have sounded so close, as if the dispatcher — or Sohn himself — were standing right next to the Rogue Trader...

The ensuing deathly silence alerted the Lord Captain that something was wrong. Following the gazes of his team, {mf|he|she} saw that the unit's dispatcher, who was carrying the large vox-caster with the antennae and transmitter, was lagging far behind the rest of the group. The ensuing deathly silence alerted the Lord Captain that something was wrong. Following the gazes of his team, {mf|he|she} saw that the unit's dispatcher, who was carrying the large vox-caster with the antennae and transmitter, was lagging far behind the rest of the group. And the transmission indicator was dark — there were no incoming messages. Even if there had been, Sohn's voice couldn't have sounded so close, as if the dispatcher — or Sohn himself — were standing right next to the Rogue Trader...

languages.text: El sepulcral silencio posterior alertó a{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} de que algo no iba bien. Siguiendo las miradas de su equipo vio que el controlador del grupo, que llevaba el voco amplificador con su antena y transmisor, estaba muy rezagado con respecto al grupo. El indicador de transmisión estaba oscuro: no estaban llegando mensajes. Además, aunque hubiera sido el caso, la voz de Sohn no habría sonado desde tan cerca, como si el controlador (o el propio Sohn) hubiera estado al lado de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente...
languages.original_text: The ensuing deathly silence alerted the Lord Captain that something was wrong. Following the gazes of his team, {mf|he|she} saw that the unit's dispatcher, who was carrying the large vox-caster with the antennae and transmitter, was lagging far behind the rest of the group. And the transmission indicator was dark — there were no incoming messages. Even if there had been, Sohn's voice couldn't have sounded so close, as if the dispatcher — or Sohn himself — were standing right next to the Rogue Trader...

traits.locale_text: El sepulcral silencio posterior alertó a{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} de que algo no iba bien. Siguiendo las miradas de su equipo vio que el controlador del grupo, que llevaba el voco amplificador con su antena y transmisor, estaba muy rezagado con respecto al grupo. El indicador de transmisión estaba oscuro: no estaban llegando mensajes. Además, aunque hubiera sido el caso, la voz de Sohn no habría sonado desde tan cerca, como si el controlador (o el propio Sohn) hubiera estado al lado de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente...

languages.text: 在那之后，便是死一般的寂静。舰长大人意识到，第一支小队出事了。{mf|他|她}循着队员们的目光，看到了小队的通讯员。那位通讯员携带着带有天线与发射器的大型音阵通讯器，早已远远地落在了其他队员后面。不仅如此，音阵系统的传输指示器并没有发光，也就是说，刚刚实际上并没有收到任何信息。就算是真的收到了信息，宋永和的声音也不可能那么清晰。刚刚的声音就好像小队通讯员，或是宋永和本人，就站在行商浪人身边一样……
languages.original_text: The ensuing deathly silence alerted the Lord Captain that something was wrong. Following the gazes of his team, {mf|he|she} saw that the unit's dispatcher, who was carrying the large vox-caster with the antennae and transmitter, was lagging far behind the rest of the group. And the transmission indicator was dark — there were no incoming messages. Even if there had been, Sohn's voice couldn't have sounded so close, as if the dispatcher — or Sohn himself — were standing right next to the Rogue Trader...

traits.locale_text: 在那之后，便是死一般的寂静。舰长大人意识到，第一支小队出事了。{mf|他|她}循着队员们的目光，看到了小队的通讯员。那位通讯员携带着带有天线与发射器的大型音阵通讯器，早已远远地落在了其他队员后面。不仅如此，音阵系统的传输指示器并没有发光，也就是说，刚刚实际上并没有收到任何信息。就算是真的收到了信息，宋永和的声音也不可能那么清晰。刚刚的声音就好像小队通讯员，或是宋永和本人，就站在行商浪人身边一样……

languages.text: その後に続いた死のような沈黙は、ロード・キャプテンに何かがおかしいと知らせる。チームの視線を追い、アンテナと送信機を備えた大型の音声通信送受信装置を運んでいる部隊の司令がグループの残りのメンバーより大きく遅れていることに気づいた。そして、送信インジケーターは光を灯しておらず、メッセージは入っていない。たとえ入っていても、ソンの声は、あたかも通信交換係…またはソン自身が自由開拓者のすぐ隣に立っているかのように、これほど近くに聞こえるはずはないのだ...
languages.original_text: The ensuing deathly silence alerted the Lord Captain that something was wrong. Following the gazes of his team, {mf|he|she} saw that the unit's dispatcher, who was carrying the large vox-caster with the antennae and transmitter, was lagging far behind the rest of the group. And the transmission indicator was dark — there were no incoming messages. Even if there had been, Sohn's voice couldn't have sounded so close, as if the dispatcher — or Sohn himself — were standing right next to the Rogue Trader...

traits.locale_text: その後に続いた死のような沈黙は、ロード・キャプテンに何かがおかしいと知らせる。チームの視線を追い、アンテナと送信機を備えた大型の音声通信送受信装置を運んでいる部隊の司令がグループの残りのメンバーより大きく遅れていることに気づいた。そして、送信インジケーターは光を灯しておらず、メッセージは入っていない。たとえ入っていても、ソンの声は、あたかも通信交換係…またはソン自身が自由開拓者のすぐ隣に立っているかのように、これほど近くに聞こえるはずはないのだ...

languages.text: Die folgende völlige Stille ließ den Lord Captain ahnen, dass etwas nicht stimmte. {mf|Er|Sie} folgte den Blicken des Teams und sah, dass der Funker der Einheit, der den großen Vox-Transmitter mit Antenne und Sender bei sich trug, weit hinter der Gruppe zurückgeblieben war. Und die Übertragungsanzeige war dunkel – keine eintreffenden Nachrichten. Und selbst dann hätte Sohns Stimme nicht so nah klingen können, als stünde der Funker – oder Sohn selbst – direkt neben {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} ...
languages.original_text: The ensuing deathly silence alerted the Lord Captain that something was wrong. Following the gazes of his team, {mf|he|she} saw that the unit's dispatcher, who was carrying the large vox-caster with the antennae and transmitter, was lagging far behind the rest of the group. And the transmission indicator was dark — there were no incoming messages. Even if there had been, Sohn's voice couldn't have sounded so close, as if the dispatcher — or Sohn himself — were standing right next to the Rogue Trader...

traits.locale_text: Die folgende völlige Stille ließ den Lord Captain ahnen, dass etwas nicht stimmte. {mf|Er|Sie} folgte den Blicken des Teams und sah, dass der Funker der Einheit, der den großen Vox-Transmitter mit Antenne und Sender bei sich trug, weit hinter der Gruppe zurückgeblieben war. Und die Übertragungsanzeige war dunkel – keine eintreffenden Nachrichten. Und selbst dann hätte Sohns Stimme nicht so nah klingen können, als stünde der Funker – oder Sohn selbst – direkt neben {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} ...

languages.text: Dans le silence de mort qui s'ensuivit, {name} comprit immédiatement que quelque chose n'allait pas. En suivant le regard de ses hommes, {mf|il|elle} vit que l'opérateur vox était loin derrière le reste du groupe, ralentit par le poids de l'imposant émetteur qu'il transportait. De plus, l'indicateur de transmission était éteint, ce qui signifiait qu'aucun message n'avait été reçu. De toute manière, la voix de Sohn n'aurait pas pu paraître si proche, comme si l'opérateur ou le capitaine lui-même se tenaient juste à côté {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}...
languages.original_text: The ensuing deathly silence alerted the Lord Captain that something was wrong. Following the gazes of his team, {mf|he|she} saw that the unit's dispatcher, who was carrying the large vox-caster with the antennae and transmitter, was lagging far behind the rest of the group. And the transmission indicator was dark — there were no incoming messages. Even if there had been, Sohn's voice couldn't have sounded so close, as if the dispatcher — or Sohn himself — were standing right next to the Rogue Trader...

traits.locale_text: Dans le silence de mort qui s'ensuivit, {name} comprit immédiatement que quelque chose n'allait pas. En suivant le regard de ses hommes, {mf|il|elle} vit que l'opérateur-vox était loin derrière le reste du groupe, ralentit par le poids de l'imposant émetteur qu'il transportait. De plus, l'indicateur de transmission était éteint, ce qui signifiait qu'aucun message n'avait été reçu. De toute manière, la voix de Sohn n'aurait pas pu paraître si proche, comme si l'opérateur ou le capitaine lui-même se tenaient juste à côté {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}...

languages.text: Takip eden ölüm sessizliği, Lord Kaptan'ın huzursuzlanmasına neden oldu. Bakışlarını takımının baktığı yöne çeviren {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, devasa voksyayarı taşıyan iletişim memurunu fark etti. Voksyayarın anteni ve vericisi kolayca seçiliyordu, iletişim memuru ise grubun gerisinde kalmıştı. İleti göstergesi kapalıydı, bu da gelen mesaj olmadığı anlamına geliyordu. Mesaj gelmiş olsaydı da Sohn'un sesi bu kadar yakından gelemez; yani iletişim memuru ya da Sohn'un ta kendisi, Hür Tacir'in yanı başındaymış gibi çıkamazdı...
languages.original_text: The ensuing deathly silence alerted the Lord Captain that something was wrong. Following the gazes of his team, {mf|he|she} saw that the unit's dispatcher, who was carrying the large vox-caster with the antennae and transmitter, was lagging far behind the rest of the group. And the transmission indicator was dark — there were no incoming messages. Even if there had been, Sohn's voice couldn't have sounded so close, as if the dispatcher — or Sohn himself — were standing right next to the Rogue Trader...

traits.locale_text: Takip eden ölüm sessizliği, Lord Kaptan'ın huzursuzlanmasına neden oldu. Bakışlarını takımının baktığı yöne çeviren {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, devasa voksyayarı taşıyan iletişim memurunu fark etti. Voksyayarın anteni ve telsizi kolayca seçiliyordu, iletişim memuru ise grubun gerisinde kalmıştı. İleti göstergesi kapalıydı, bu da gelen mesaj olmadığı anlamına geliyordu. Gelen bir mesaj olsaydı da Sohn'un sesinin bu kadar yakından gelmesi imkânsızdı. Sesin kalitesi, iletişim memuru ya da Sohn'un kendisi, Hür Tacir'in yanı başında gibiydi…
